'Twas the season for all to gather and decorate...
...as family and friends cluster to celebrate.
But when decorating your tree this holiday season,...
...use these safety tips with good reason.
Choose a tree that is fresh and green...
...and water it daily to maintain its sheen.
Use only lights with the "UL" mark...
...and follow the instructions to prevent a spark.
And never have your tree near a heat source...
...because a tree fire would be devastating, of course.
Use these tips this November and December...
...for a magical holiday to always remember.
